sections.comments: FNH 200 101 is currently blocked from registration, as there is a waitlist for the course (FNH 200 0W1). If you wish to be considered for the course, please add yourself to the waitlist.
FNH 200 104 is currently blocked from registration, as there is a waitlist for the course (FNH 200 0W4). If you wish to be considered for the course, please add yourself to the waitlist.

This is a Wait List Section for FNH 200 Section 101. Students will be moved according to their priority on the waitlist if space becomes available. All queries should be directed to the Faculty of Land and Food Systems Student Services at students@landfood.ubc.ca. Note: 1st year LFS students will only be considered for the lecture section once 2nd year standing requirements have been met through summer courses.

This section has been blocked from registration - if you wish to be considered for this course, please add yourself to the corresponding waitlist (FNH 200 1W1).This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. All communication will be by email. It is your responsibility to ensure you have a valid email account so that you can be contacted with important information and updates. You can update your contact information through the Student Service Centre.Login to the course through canvas.ubc.ca   Students who are new to Canvas will want to check out a UBC Students Guide to CanvasFor more information including resources for distance learners visit distancelearning.ubc.caPlease register in the waitlisted section 1W1 if this course is full.This course will use Proctorio (an online remote proctoring service) for invigilation of both the midterm and final exam. Proctorio will record your webcam, computer screen, or other actions during the exam session and share that information with your instructor. The recorded information meets British Columbia's Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act.In order to use Proctorio, you are required to have access to a regular computer (Windows/Mac desktop or laptop). You cannot take the exams from mobile devices (e.g., iPhone, iPad, Android device, tablet, etc). You need a working webcam and microphone and you will need to install both the Google Chrome web browser  and  Proctorios Chrome extension.

description: Chemical and physical properties of foods; issues pertaining to safety, nutritive value and consumer acceptability; government regulations pertaining to food safety, quality and additives; preservation techniques and transformation of agricultural commodities to food products; foods of the future.
